pages.title: Titanis
pages.text: The holotype material is fragmentary, consisting of only an incomplete right tarsometatarsus ($(o)lower leg bone$()) and phalanx ($(o)toe bone$()), but comes from one of the largest phorusrhacid individuals known.

pages.title: Titanis
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: None Days
